TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DocumentEvents2_XMLAfterInsertEventHandler(XMLNode NewXMLNode, bool InUndoRedo);
.class public auto ansi sealed DocumentEvents2_XMLAfterInsertEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DocumentEvents2_XMLAfterInsertEventHandler(NewXMLNode As XMLNode, InUndoRedo As Boolean)
public delegate void DocumentEvents2_XMLAfterInsertEventHandler(XMLNode ^ NewXMLNode, bool InUndoRedo);
type DocumentEvents2_XMLAfterInsertEventHandler = delegate of XMLNode * bool -> unit

param.name: NewXMLNode
param.span: 新添加的 XML 节点。

param.name: InUndoRedo
param.span: 为 true ，则表示使用 Microsoft Word 中的 撤消或 重做功能时执行的操作。

span.span: True indicates the action was performed using the Undo or Redo feature in Microsoft Word.

summary.span: 用于为事件添加事件处理程序的委托类型 。

span.span: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event.

summary.span: 当用户向文档中添加新的 XML 元素时， XMLAfterInsert事件发生。

span.span: The XMLAfterInsert event occurs when a user adds a new XML element to a document.

para.span: 如果此 参数为True，则从不在 XMLAfterInsert 和 XMLBeforeDelete 事件运行的情况下更改文档中的 XML。

span.span: If the parameter is True, never change the XML in a document while the XMLAfterInsert and XMLBeforeDelete events are running.

para.span: 如果 InUndoRedo 参数为 False，则可以在文档中插入和删除 XML，但请注意， XMLAfterInsert和 事件不会尝试相互取消，从而导致无限循环。

span.span: If the InUndoRedo parameter is False, you can insert and delete the XML in the document, but be careful that the XMLAfterInsert and events will not try to cancel each other out, causing an infinite loop.

para.span: 您可以通过使用全局布尔变量阻止无限循环，并在错误处理程序的开头检查该变量。

span.span: You can prevent infinite loops by using a global Boolean variable and check for that at the beginning of the error handler.
